About

About

Hey there! 👋
Ferdynand Odhiambo is a Full Stack Software Developer with over two years of experience in the tech industry, specializing in web development, integration engineering, AI, and machine learning. Proficient in Python, Django, Go, and JavaScript, he designs and delivers innovative, scalable solutions, including an AI-driven talent-matching system that optimizes task allocation based on skills and availability. His expertise includes architecting and optimizing databases with PostgreSQL and SQLite, complemented by rigorous testing using FastAPI and Swagger to ensure high-quality, robust deliverables.
Full Stack DevelopmentAI & Machine LearningPython & JavaScriptDatabase Architecture

Python

LandSnap

LandSnap is a Django-based web application designed to analyze land changes over time using comparative image analysis. It leverages advanced computer vision algorithms to detect and visualize differences between two aerial images of the same location taken at different times.
